main_title: Hotuna shida da ke bayani a kan sauyin yanayi
main_standfirst: Hotunan sun yi bayani a kan yadda da kuma dalilin da yasa ake samun sauyin yanayi a duniya, a daidai lokacin da shugabannin duniya suke taro a Paris don tattauna wa kan wata yarjejeniya da za a magance dumamar duniya.
temperature_par_1: Madaidaicin yanayin zafin duniya ya karu da kusan kashi 0.85C (1.4F) cikin shekaru 100. A karni na 21 ne aka tara shekaru 13 cikin 14 da suka fi kowanne dumi sun kasance ne cikin karni na 21, inda ake tunanin shekarar 2015 ma za ta bi layi.

greenhouse_sub_title: Sakamakon iska kala daban-daban da ke samuwa daga sararin samaniya musamman ma wacce muke shaka ta carbon dioxide
greenhouse_par_1: Masana kimiyya sun yi amannar cewa iskar da ake fitarwa a masana'antu da harkar noma suna kara wa iskar sararin samaniya tasiri, kamar yadda samaniyar duniya ke samun makamashi daga rana.
greenhouse_par_2: Aikin bil-adama kamar kona abubuwa kamar Kwal da Mai da gas sun akara yawan hayaki, babbar iskar da take taimakawa wajen dumama yanayi. Haka nan kuma ana sare dazuzzuka masu rage hayaki
greenhouse_par_3: Karuwar iska a sararin samaniya a yanzu ya fi na kowanne lokaci a baya cikin shekaru 800,000 ya kuma karu a watan Mayu wannan shekarar.
greenhouse_chart_key: Yawan iskar da ke karuwa a kowanne wata kan kai miliyan
greenhouse_chart_source: Wani shiri na Scripps CO2 ne ya samar da bayanan daga wajen sa ido na Mauna Loa
ice_subtitle: Kankarar da ke tekun Arctic na narkewa
ice_par_1: Karuwar zafi da yanayi mai tsanani da karuwar ruwan teku duk suna da alaka da dumamar yanayi kuma hakan zai yi mummunan tasiri a yankunan duniya.
ice_par_2: Tun a shekarar 1900, yawan ruwan teku ya karu da tsawon santi mita 19 a fadin duniya. Yawan ruwan teku na karuwa sosai a shekarun nan, inda tsibirai da kasashen da suke kwari ke fuskantar hadari.
ice_par_3: Raguwar kankara a yankin polar ya taimaka ga wannan karuwar
ice_par_4: Kankara a yankin Actic na raguwa saboda yanayi na zafi, ko da yake hakan ba ya tasiri sosai a yawan ruwan da ake samu na teku.
ice_vis_key_fact: An yi asarar yankin da kankara ke kwance da a taikace ya lunka yankin Burtaniya sau 10 idan aka kwatanta da yawanta daga farkon shekarun 1980
ice_vis_chart_title: Karancin kankarar yankin Arctic,  million square km --
ice_vis_source: Bayani: Cibiyar tattara bayanai kan kankara
future_subtitle: Karuwar zafi da karuwar mummunan yanayi
future_par_1: Babu tabbas akan girman tasirin da hakan zai yi
future_par_2: Sauyen-sauyen zasu iya haifar da karancin kyakkawan ruwa, ya haifar da mugun sauyi wajen yanayin noman abinci sannan ya kara yawan mutanen da zasu mutu a sakamakon ambaliya, ko mahaukaciyar guguwa ko zafi da kuma fari.
future_par_3: Dalilin haka shine ana sa ran sauyin yanayi zai haifar da yawan samun yanayi mai tsanani - saidai danganta wani yanayi guda daya da dumamar yanayi abu ne mai sarkakiya
future_vis_part_1_par_1: Idan yawan hayaki ya kai kololuwa tsakanin 2010-2020 sannan ya ragu matuka (RCP2.6)
future_vis_part_2_par_1: Idan yawan hayaki ya ci gaba da karuwa a baki dayan karni na 21 (RCP8.5)
future_vis_source: Inda aka samo:Kwamitin sauyin yanayi na duniya- Rahotan hasashe na biyar (AR5)
actions_subtitle_top_ten: Kasashe goma wadanda suka fi fitar da hayaki mai gurbata muhalli
actions_chart_title: Kasashe goma masu fitar da hayaki sune ke da kashi 70 na yawan hayakin da ake fitarwa
top_ten_source: Inda aka samo: Bayani kan Carbon, Kididda daga 2012
limiting_damage_par_1: Kasashe 146 sun gabatar da shirye shiryensu na rage yawan hayakin da suke fitarwa da ake fatan sune zasu zama ginshiki na yarjejjeniyar da zata wajaba akan kowace kasa kan sauyin yanayi
limiting_damage_par_2: Kamar yadda hasashen October UN report, ya nuna za a samu kari na 2.7 akan yawan hayaki gabanin ci gaban masana'antu zuwa shekara ta 2100
limiting_damage_par_3: Masana kimiyya sun tabbatar da cewar idan karin zafi ya zarta digiri 2, hakan yana iya haifar da tasiri mai hadarin gaske da muni akan sauyin yanayi, wanda zai fi yin illa a kasashe masu fama da talauci
actions_subtitle_ave_warming: Takaitacccen hasashen zafi zuwa shekara ta 2100
ave_warming_source: Inda aka samu: Kididdigar da aka tara daga Climate Analytics, ECOFYS, Sabuwar ciiyar nazari kan yanaji da cibiyar Potsdam ta bincike akan tasirin yanayi.
